hero.description: Skip the resume screening. Take skill-based assessments and get shortlisted by top engineering teams instantly.

selectionSteps.title: Online Proctored Assessment
selectionSteps.description: Take a specialized anti-cheat assessment mapped directly to the JD skills.

selectionSteps.title: Instant Reporting
selectionSteps.description: Your comprehensive exam report is generated immediately upon completion.

selectionSteps.title: Daily Score Notifications
selectionSteps.description: Recruiters are notified of candidate scores on a daily basis; however, your contact details stay masked to ensure skill-first hiring.

selectionSteps.title: The Handshake Request
selectionSteps.description: Recruiters filter by score, location, experience, and CTC. They send a "Handshake Request" to candidates they wish to unmask.

selectionSteps.title: Candidate Approval
selectionSteps.description: You review the request. Once you accept, your details are unblocked for that specific recruiter only.

selectionSteps.title: Direct Interaction
selectionSteps.description: Candidate and Recruiter interact directly for the final interview stages.

cta.recruiterDescription: Join the February Job Fair and access pre-vetted, skill-verified QA talent. Skip weeks of resume screening and interview only candidates who've already proven their expertise.
cta.pilotInfo: Only 10 companies for this pilot • First come, first served

recruiterSection.title: Join the February Job Fair
recruiterSection.description: Get exclusive access to pre-vetted QA talent. Limited to 10 companies for this pilot program.

benefits.title: Skill-Verified Candidates
benefits.description: View detailed assessment reports and leaderboards

benefits.title: Privacy-First System
benefits.description: Candidates' contact details remain masked until mutual interest

benefits.title: Instant Access
benefits.description: Interview-ready candidates who've already proven their skills

benefits.title: Zero Screening Time
benefits.description: Skip resume reviews and go straight to qualified interviews

recruiterSection.submitText: Recruiter registration submitted! Our team will contact you shortly.
